description:
"U-Motix" is the ultimate companion app for your messengers! "U-Motix" enables you to send emoticons to your friends and family with ease.

With the new Smile Editor, you can literally create hundreds of completely customized emoticons to send to whomever you choose!  The Smile Editor lets you select from a large variety of heads, mouths and eyes, nose, hair... 
It even lets you change the color, size and position of each facial part to get the exact expression you are looking for! 

If creating your own emoticons is too much work for you, our extensive library of preset smiles is sure to give you what you're looking for in any conversation!

With the iPhone's Retina display and for the new iPhone 5, messages and images have never been clearer!  The "U-Motix" app takes full advantage of this feature allowing for images to be colorful and crisp. 
For this reason, "U-Motix"'s image quality is superior to other comparable iPhone apps and websites. 

Don't spend one more day with the same old boring messages you have been sending back and forth with your friends. Change the way you communicate today with "U-Motix" and take advantage of its awesome features!

* Create custom Smiles and share to your friends
* Share with all other apps (included iMessage and various messengers such WhatsApp and others) that support Pasteboard.
* Select from Library of preset Smiles
* Get fun with the Randomizer that create images for you!
* Import from Camera roll and use your photo to create smile-cards!
* Attach as image to your emails 
* Attach to Twitter messages
* Store to Camera Roll as giant picture
* Print!
releaseNotes:
iOS7 is out with innovations and some features are deprecated and do not work anymore.
Sadly is not working anymore the app to app direct communication, what does mean ? 
That the app is not working anymore with Kik Messenger.

We decided to do a fresh new start changing the app name and do some changes around to make it working with all other messengers and iOS apps.
We are working on a iOS7 new funtastic interface, stay tuned and updated!.

* removed Kik compatibility
* removed Users Gallery
* removed unlock the app, now is always unlocked and show Ads
* removed freebie of the day
* removed video tutorials
